entry.title: New release for Dagu: v1.16.8
entry.content:
Changelog

  • ada8c48f4e68818817b0419649b80bf93df2f464 Fix build error in frontend

What's Changed

  • added zoom in zoom out for DAGs. #774 by @kriyanshii in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/899
  • update Makefile build-ui #901 by @kriyanshii in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/904
  • [#905] DAG visualization updates by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/906
  • added support for custom exit codes on retry #792 by @kriyanshii in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/902

Special thanks

Huge shout-out to @kriyanshii for multiple awesome contributions recently!

✨ Retry on Custom Exit Codes: Finer control over task retries. You can specify which exit codes trigger a retry (Resolves #792). ✨ Diagram Zoom: Zoom in/out now supported for navigating large DAGs easily (Resolves #774) ✨ Build Fix: Resolved a key issue preventing the frontend (make build-ui) from building (Fixes #901).

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/compare/v1.16.7...v1.16.8

entry.title: New release for Dagu: v1.16.9
entry.content:
This is a release to fix an issue in loading legacy basic authentication configurations.

Changelog

  • 557874ae8f969fe41369587b52ada8e95295f913 [#926] fix: set basicauth flag correctly when legacy config key specified (#929)

What's Changed

  • ci: add docker-next workflow and docs for next preview image by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/928
  • [#926] fix: set basicauth flag correctly when legacy config key specified by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/929

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/compare/v1.16.8...v1.16.9

entry.title: New release for Dagu: v1.16.10
entry.content:
